Functions

unsigned int my_hardware_concurrency ()
 Returns number of concurrent threads supported by the implementation. The value should be considered only a hint. More...
 

Detailed Description

Provides hardware info for parallel execution, if the compiler is old.

Function Documentation

unsigned int my_hardware_concurrency ( )

Returns number of concurrent threads supported by the implementation. The value should be considered only a hint.

Returns
- number of concurrent threads supported. If the value is not well defined or not computable, returns 0.
